Sentencas: The single-phase region of La1-xSrxCrO3 (x = 0.1, 0.2, 0.3) was precisely determined as a function of temperature, P-O2 and Sr content.
Titulo: Chemical stability of La1-xSrxCrO3 in oxidizing atmospheres

Sentencas: The powders with the nominal composition of La1-xSrxCrO3 were equilibrated under various conditions, and then identified by XRD analyses.
Titulo: Chemical stability of La1-xSrxCrO3 in oxidizing atmospheres

Sentencas: To confirm the equilibration, two independent experiments were performed for each composition observing (i) the precipitation of the second phase from a single-phase solid solution, and (ii) the formation of the single phase from the constituent oxides.
Titulo: Chemical stability of La1-xSrxCrO3 in oxidizing atmospheres

Sentencas: Two kinds of second phases, SrCrO4 and an unknown phase, were observed depending on the conditions.
Titulo: Chemical stability of La1-xSrxCrO3 in oxidizing atmospheres

Sentencas: The second phases tended to appear at low temperature, in high P-O2 and with a large Sr content.
Titulo: Chemical stability of La1-xSrxCrO3 in oxidizing atmospheres

Sentencas: The single-phase regions obtained via the two equilibration routes were in good agreement with each other.
Titulo: Chemical stability of La1-xSrxCrO3 in oxidizing atmospheres

Sentencas: The thermodynamic calculations on the supposition of ideality of the solid solution essentially reproduced the experimental results.
Titulo: Chemical stability of La1-xSrxCrO3 in oxidizing atmospheres

Sentencas: When this material is used as the interconnects of solid oxide fuel cells, much attention should be paid to its relatively narrow solubility range of Sr; for example, the solubility limit is approximately 0.1 under a typical cathode-side condition (1273 K, air).
Titulo: Chemical stability of La1-xSrxCrO3 in oxidizing atmospheres
